ansi writes:
> Just delete it!

Deleting unit tests isn't a good idea, IMHO.

The issue that stack pointed to, which I raised and isolated, is
related to the "s" flag on the open calls in the DiskStack. Changing
the mode from "rws" to "rw" on some platforms appears to 'solve' the
problem, for some meaning of solve.

To my mind the whole synchronization implementation in the various
JDKs is busted on most platforms.

    -tree
